book.title: Gentoo PowerPC SELinux Handbook
book.author: Main Gentoo Handbook Authors, Editors, and Contributors
book.abstract: This is the Gentoo PowerPC SELinux Handbook, based on the Gentoo handbook.

part.title: Installing Gentoo SELinux
part.abstract: In this part you learn how to install Gentoo SELinux on your system. *Under Construction*

chapter.title: About the Gentoo Linux Installation
chapter.abstract: Users not familiar with Gentoo do not always know that choice is what Gentoo is all about.

part.title: Converting to Gentoo SELinux
part.abstract: SELinux alternatively can be installed on current Linux installations. This Chapter deals with converting a prexisting Gentoo install to SELinux.

chapter.title: Initial preparations
chapter.abstract: A few preparations must be done before installing SELinux packages.

chapter.title: Boot SELinux Kernel
chapter.abstract: Install and boot a SELinux kernel.

chapter.title: Install SELinux Userland
chapter.abstract: Install SELinux packages and policy, and label filesystems.

part.title: Working with Gentoo
part.abstract: Learn how to work with Gentoo: installing software, altering variables, changing portage behaviour etc.

chapter.title: USE flags
chapter.abstract: USE-flags are a very important aspect of Gentoo. In this chapter, you learn to work with USE-flags and understand how USE-flags interact with your system.

chapter.title: Portage and Software
chapter.abstract: The main reason for portage is to maintain the software on your system. In this chapter you learn how to get information from a package, update your package database, install/remove/update software and more...

chapter.title: Portage Features
chapter.abstract: Gentoo's Portage allows for several features that improve portage-related aspects, such as build time. This chapter explains the existing features.

chapter.title: Controlling Portage Behaviour
chapter.abstract: You can tweak Portage to your own needs/environment. Learn how to protect files, select mirrors, change directory locations and more.

chapter.title: Initscripts
chapter.abstract: Gentoo uses a special initscript format which, amongst other features, allows dependency-driven decisions and virtual initscripts. This chapter explains all these aspects and explains how to deal with these scripts.

chapter.title: Environment Variables
chapter.abstract: With Gentoo you can easily manage the environment variables for your system. This chapter explains how you do that, and also describes frequently used variables.

part.title: Working with SELinux
part.abstract: Learn how to work with SELinux

chapter.title: SELinux Overview
chapter.abstract: SELinux has many parts to understand. This chapter discusses SELinux's important concepts and policy.

chapter.title: SELinux HOWTO
chapter.abstract: This chapter deals with how to common operations in SELinux.

chapter.title: SELinux FAQ
chapter.abstract: This chapter deals with frequently asked questions in SELinux.

part.title: Troubleshooting SELinux
part.abstract: When encountering problems on a machine, SELinux can add extra difficulty in fixing the problem. This chapter walks through fixing common problems.

chapter.title: Policy Not Loaded on Boot
chapter.abstract: This chapter deals with the problem of the policy not being loaded on boot.

chapter.title: Trouble Logging in Locally
chapter.abstract: This chapter deals with problems logging in locally at the console.

chapter.title: Trouble Logging in Remotely
chapter.abstract: This chapter deals with problems logging in remotely by ssh.
